name: I Can't Believe He's Gone (V)
Lore: 'Even though Luke felt the pain of losing his mentor, Obi-Wan continued to give him strength and guidance through the Force.',
Text: 'If Obi-Wan is out of play, use 1 Force to deploy on table. During battle, may use 1 Force to add 5 to your total power there for remainder of turn. Once per turn, if Luke a captive, may activate 1 Force. (Immune to Control.)(Original concept by Greg Shaw - Mystic Visions 2003)',
